price: De: “Budur Allahın dini (boyası)! Kimin dini Allahın dinindən (boyasından) daha gözəl ola bilər? Biz yalnız Ona ibadət edənlərik!”
arabic: صِبۡغَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ صِبۡغَةٗۖ وَنَحۡنُ لَهُۥ عَٰبِدُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ṣib'ghata al-lahi waman aḥsanu mina al-lahi ṣib'ghatan wanaḥnu lahu ʿābidūna
